features: Coverage up to 3,000 sq. ft. and 35 plus devices.Processor : Quad-core 1.7GHz processor. Antenna : Four (4) high-performance internal antennas.
Fast AX3000 Gigabit speed with WiFi 6 technology for uninterrupted streaming, HD video gaming, and web conferencing
Connects to your existing cable modem and replaces your WiFi router. Compatible with any internet service provider up to 1Gbps including cable, satellite, fiber, and DSL
Plug in computers, game consoles, streaming players, and more with 2 (1 plus1) Gigabit Ethernet LAN ports in the router and satellite
Sets up in minutes with the Nighthawk App; easily manage WiFi settings, test internet speed, and monitor data usage
NETGEAR Armor protects your family's WiFi with an automatic shield of security across all your connected devices with a 30-day free trial
Expand coverage by 1,500 sq. ft. with each additional Nighthawk Whole Home Mesh WiFi 6 Add-on MS70 satellite (sold separately, not compatible with Nighthawk Tri-band or Orbi WiFi 6 Mesh systems)
body.description: Your family wants super-fast, reliable WiFi for your whole home, up to 3,000 sq. ft. With the Nighthawk® Mesh WiFi 6 System, experience the future of WiFi with next-generation 802.11ax (WiFi 6). Enjoy dual band technology designed to handle 4X more connections and the increasing demand for fast gaming without interruption and smooth streaming. The Nighthawk Mesh System comes with one high-power satellite to provide you with broad WiFi coverage. Nighthawk® app allows for easy setup and WiFi management.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Simultaneously Stream Everything at Fast Speed Now you can enjoy uninterrupted movies, gaming, video calls and more on 35+ devices, all at the same time. Connect a House Full of WiFiDevices Without Compromise MK72’s 4 WiFi streams deliver high performance and reliability for up to 4x more smart home devices. Seamless Roaming Everywhere Stay connected as you roam around home using a single network name.

Gigabit Speed Wired Connection Two (2) Gigabit Ethernet ports on the router and satellite give you fast wired connections to your computer, game console, TV or other high-speed device. Essential Internet Security & Smart Parental Controls NETGEAR Armor protects your family's WiFi with an automatic shield of security across your connected devices. Smart Parental Controls provide a safe, online experience for your kids. Both include a 30-day free trial. Supports Fast Internet Plans Best for internet plans over 100Mbps. Simply connect to your existing modem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product unbelievable speeds
reviews.reviewText: I couldn’t be more satisfied with my NETGEAR mesh system for WiFi 6. I have struggled with internet providers and their equipment. I haven’t found a system that works for my household. That is until I ordered netgears mesh system. I can’t tell you the night and day difference. Easy to use and set up. Being able to monitor my internet , devices connected and have all the access at my fingertips is amazing. I couldn’t be happier with my equipment and my next buy will be another satellite so I can bring WiFi / Ethernet connection to my workshop!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic coverage, no dead spots. Fisrst find out if your equipment can use Wifi6. I have an old laptop, and even though it has windows 10, speed was 10 mbps. Purchased a wifi6 dongle and now speeds are at 200+ mbps. big difference. Roku's now have no buffering, we have 3 in system. Overall great product, great directions for installation, fantastic product support

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am not techy so had my nephew set it up. Was very easy for him. the second one I put in the kitchen, and it took care of the problem with keeping the signal. Have not had any problems with the signals in the house or outside in the yard and garage. installed at end of Nov 2023

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: WiFi speed is definitely faster and the range was extended by a significant amount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Strong signal but unstable connection
reviews.reviewText: Setup is slow. I couldn't add the satellite via the router's web interface after numerous trials, so I had to download the app on my phone to finish the installation. With the mobile app, it took a while for both the router and the satellite to be detected and installed.The mesh network worked fine for a couple days. While it was working, the signal was strong and the speed was good. However, after a couple days, my Samsung TV (bought in 2020) started to drop connection sporadically. Tried manually switching channels but to no avail. Also tried using the router only without the satellite, but the TV still couldn't get stable connectivity. To me this is a deal breaker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great coverage, but issues when gaming
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mesh system to improve coverage at my home which has a detached garage. My previous wireless was able to reach but would become less reliable during the summer months. The Netgear Mesh system does a fantastic job at resolving coverage issues as signals throughout the home are all good/great now. All devices are able to connect without issue, and overall, connectivity has been good.My main issue with this system is consistency. While I get great coverage for web surfing/media consumption, I cannot say the same for gaming. When gaming I will experience periods of lag which can make competitive play unbearably frustrating. This is while being directly wired to the satellite mesh which is working without issue when doing anything but gaming. From what I have read, this may be an issue with QOS settings, but as of yet, I have found no workable solution. Furthermore, a common problem with mesh systems is which device a wireless user connects to. My wife's computer is about 12 feet from the main hub, and yet here wireless signal becomes unstable at times as if it was connecting to the one located in the garage. I am unsure what can be done to address this as I hear this is somewhat common with mesh systems.Hopefully, with some tweaks/firmware updates, these issues can be resolved. I may decouple the networks (making 2.4 and 5gHz bands separate) to see if that helps at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: 45 days into owning this equipment it drops connections constantly and is worthless. Not even worth troubleshooting. I’ll buy something else and caulk this up to lost money. Never again Netgear!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars You can extend your wifi network to a different building.
reviews.reviewText: My house and shop are 200ft apart and my internet originates in my shop. I had a cat5 cable that was run from shop to house. I was able to install the router in the shop and the satellite in the house. I plugged one end into the router network port and the other into the satellite network port. Now i can go from one to the other on the same wifi/SID.Also note, the documentation online led me to this setup option.
Excelente producto. Funciona muy bien y la aplicación hace que la toda la información esté clara y fácil de monitorear
